The TS config file used by eslint should be the same as the one used by your Typescript compiler.
This specific config extends the default TS config of a React environment.

```json
{
  /* extend the default typescript config of the base env (in this example, react-env) */
  "extends": "@teambit/react.react-env/config/tsconfig.json",
  "include": ["**/*", "**/*.json"]
}
```
